name: Last life (Duhndal)
description:
Fight waves of robots in an action shooter in a game called "Last Life" 

You're the last hope for humanity. 

Last life is a fast-paced action shooter where you fight waves of robots in a post-apocalyptic world. 

If you're looking for a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat, this is the one for you. 

Last life is currently in development with multiplayer in sight.

- This game is still in development

Feel free to come with feedback and ideas to new features.
But keep in mind that the game is still in development and we are working on creating new guns, upgrades and a story to complete.
